data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Some people believe that success comes primarily from taking risks. Others believe that success is the result of careful planning. What do you believe? Why? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: The controversial issue with respect to the key to success has attracted large public attention and sparked a heated debate. Personally, I believe that success is the result of careful planning. The first and foremost reason why I hold this position is that without thoughtful planning prior to the commencement, a project is highly likely to end up in a mess due to uncertainty. This being said, a comprehensive plan can effectively increase the likelihood of success. （77 字）
